InstructionData.Title: pipePurge
InstructionData.Description: activates all active vents in a network when lever is down and shuts them when lever is upâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: Rizzard of Oz
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias activationLever d0
define activeVents -1129453144
alias leverState r0
l leverState activationLever Open
sb -1129453144 On 1
init: yield beq leverState 1 openVentLoop l leverState activationLever Open sb -1129453144 On 0
j init
openVentLoop: yield l leverState activationLever Open beq leverState 0 init sb -1129453144 On 1
j openVentLoop
